Mobile App Development that Connects

Our apps connect with your customers for better UX

Home Services Services Mobile App Development

Increase your efficiency to deliver the best products

We are a mobile app development company helping businesses to build fully customized mobile apps with minimal time and cost investment. Aranv is the first choice whether you are looking to create an app for iOS, Android, Windows Mobile or to build a cross-platform app.

As smartphones and mobile devices have become ubiquitous, mobile app development has seen an upward spurt. Mobile technology has transformed everything around us. With the tremendous growth in smartphone users, every business is taking advantage of the technology that comes with these devices.

We create Apps for

  • Enterprise Apps

    Get the most promising and efficient enterprise software /app to help manage your large business. Easy to implement and efficient for running an enterprise.

  • Business Apps

    Improve your day-to-day business operations using our unique business applications recouping your Capital and operational investment.

  • Consumers Apps

    Make your customers happy and delighted with improved connectivity and feature-rich business apps. These help access your business from any time anywhere.

iOS App Development

We deliver full-service iOS development solutions. As the iPhone dominates smartphone technology, it is the most looked-for service to build iPhone apps on the App Store. Our team is reliable and well accustomed to the latest tools and technologies. We also help you create, develop and submit your app to the App Store. It is the sole point of distribution for mobile apps on iOS and is developed and maintained by Apple Inc.

What we Do

  • iPhone App Development
  • iOS App with MLKit
  • iOS App with SiriKit
  • iOS App Testing
  • iPad App development
  • Apple TV Apps
  • iOS App with ARKit

Android App Development

Aranv offers end-to-end is a well-versed Android development team. Our team makes the most of the platform. As Android is the most widely used mobile OS, it powers hundreds of millions of mobile devices. It is a world-class platform for developing apps and games for Android users. Android helps develop apps, games, and other digital content. It is flexible and takes advantage of the hardware capabilities available on the device.

What we Do

  • Android Smartphone Apps
  • Android Things Apps
  • Android Apps with Dialogflow
  • Android TV Apps
  • Android Tablet Apps
  • Chromebook Apps
  • Firebase Integration

Full-Service Develpment from Specialized Developers

  • Cross Platforms Apps

    Build a cross-platform application that can run on various operating systems, instead of creating different app versions for each platform.

  • Progressive Web Apps

    We create progressive web apps for web browser APIs. You can also feature it along with traditional progressive enhancement strategy. Deliver a native app-like user experience to your customers.

  • Hybrid Apps

    We develop hybrid apps for web browsers and native applications designed for a particular platform that needs to be installed on a device.

  • Ionic Apps

    We build production-ready mobile apps that take advantage of Angular’s power and flexibility. Get customized progressive web apps for better connectivity.

  • React Native

    With the best-in-class JavaScript library, we create react native apps combining the best parts of native development with React.

  • Cloud Apps

    Simplify your functioning with extremely secure and cost-effective cloud apps. Not only boost your business functioning but also your employee productivity.

Hire a Mobile App Development Company With Proven Expertise!

Avail the services of the best app developers in the industry with years of experience in the industry. We guarantee to save in terms of time and money with no compromise on quality. We have the technical ability and infrastructure to cater to almost all types of mobile apps. Our solutions transform and help upgrade apps with the changing platforms to gain maximum features and functionality.

Our Process

Consulting and App Strategy

Our Application Strategy is focused on bringing an alignment between stakeholders and the goals of the application, choice of technologies, and business needs. We evaluate frameworks and mobile platforms to choose suitable options. We also conceptualize the life cycle of the mobile app. The outcome of this cycle is an Application strategy with a roadmap report.

UX/UI Design

Mobile apps need a strong creative design for an amazing UI/UX experience. Our team has developed the dexterity to build such solutions. We have a dedicated UI / UX team with consumer, business & enterprise attention. Our team works on emerging mobility technologies and we build solutions that accelerate time to market.

Coding & Development

With mobile application development services, we provide end-to-end mobile app designing, testing services, and development services across multiple platforms. Our skilled developers have years of experience in implementing mobile apps using mobile implementation methodology that leads to mobile app deployments.

Testing and Delivery

We perform end-to-end testing and delivery of the mobile apps. We carry out manual and automated testing, as well as compatibility testing. We test the server performance and on-device performance along with security testing and cross-functional testing to make sure we deliver the perfect mobile app.

Complete App Store Deployment

Our team has experience in developing visually attractive, fully functional, and efficient apps for iOS, Android, and others. This makes Aranv a complete app development and deployment company. We have research-driven market-oriented experts who add value to your product.

Superior Maintenance & Support services

We offer software augmentation and maintenance services by fixing glitches, streamlining and refinement services. Get superior support from the team.
